Class StructureParser

java.lang.Object

public class StructureParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods that handle chemical structures

validateSmiles

public static boolean validateSmiles(java.lang.String smiles)
                              throws java.io.IOException
This methods validates if the provided SMILES string is valid or not Can be called by any program interested in SMILES validation

Parameters:
smiles - SMILES string to be validated
Returns:
true or false
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSimpleExtendedSMILES

public static java.lang.String getSimpleExtendedSMILES(java.lang.String extendedSMILES)
                                                throws StructureException
This method removes everything in ChemAxon Extended SMILES extension, but Atom Position Input: [*][H].O[*].OC1=CC=C(C[C@H](N[*])C([*])=O)C=C1 |r,$_R1;;;_R2;;;;;;;;;_R1;;_R2;;;$,c:14,t:3,5| Output: [*][H].O[*].OC1=CC=C(C[C@H](N[*])C([*])=O)C=C1 |$_R1;;;_R2;;;;;;;;;_R1;;_R2;;;$|

Parameters:
extendedSMILES -
Returns:
simpleExtendedSMILES
Throws:
StructureException

getUniqueExtendedSMILES

public static java.lang.String getUniqueExtendedSMILES(java.lang.String extendedSMILES)
                                                throws StructureException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
This method returns unique cxsmiles i.e. cxsmiles:u format, to be used for monomer registration

Parameters:
extendedSMILES -
Returns:
chemaxon extended unique smiles
Throws:
StructureException
java.io.IOException

removeRgroup

public static chemaxon.struc.MolAtom removeRgroup(chemaxon.struc.Molecule mol,
                                                  int rGroupId)
                                           throws StructureException
mol is changed after this step, make sure to clone it if need to preserve state the first R group with the specifid ID is removed

Parameters:
mol -
rGroupId -
Returns:
MolAtom this is the atom in the new mol which will be used for connection later, could be null
Throws:
StructureException

getRgroupAtom

public static chemaxon.struc.MolAtom getRgroupAtom(chemaxon.struc.Molecule mol,
                                                   int rGroupId)
                                            throws StructureException
MolAtom associates with the first R group with the specifid ID is returned

Parameters:
mol -
rGroupId -
Returns:
MolAtom the MolAtom object that represents the first R group with rGroupId
Throws:
StructureException

removeRgroup

public static chemaxon.struc.MolAtom removeRgroup(chemaxon.struc.Molecule mol,
                                                  chemaxon.struc.MolAtom rgroup)
                                           throws StructureException
mol is changed after this step, make sure to clone it if need to preserve state It is possible that there are more than one R groups that have the same ID as rgroup

Parameters:
mol -
rgroup -
Returns:
MolAtom which is the single connection MolAtom to rgroup
Throws:
StructureException

merge

public static void merge(chemaxon.struc.Molecule molecule1,
                         chemaxon.struc.MolAtom molAtom1,
                         chemaxon.struc.Molecule molecule2,
                         chemaxon.struc.MolAtom molAtom2)
                  throws StructureException
This method merges molecule2 into molecule1,

Parameters:
molecule1 -
molAtom1 - atom to be removed, the connected atom is used for merging
molecule2 -
molAtom2 - atom to be removed from molecule2, the connected atom is used for merging
Throws:
StructureException

processMoleculeInfo

protected static MoleculeInfo processMoleculeInfo(java.util.List<MoleculeInfo> chunks,
                                                  java.util.List<MoleculeInfo> caps)
                                           throws NotationException
This method should be used by SimpleNotationParser and ComplexNotationParser, not exposed to public

Parameters:
chunks - - list of main MoleculeInfo
caps - - list of cap MoleculeInfo
Returns:
MoleculeInfo after processing
Throws:
NotationException
